title: Defense Of The Town 2 [Action, Eng, 2018]
description:
In the continuation of the game Defense Of The Town, once again you need to protect a small town and carry out a mission to save humanity from destruction. Collect weapons and kill enemies, mercilessly. Use the soldier and the larger group to destroy the most difficult targets.
In Defense Of The Town 2 the map is enlarged, and more enemies and background music were added.

Control keys:

WASD - Character Movement
SPACEBAR - Jump
SHIFT - Sprint
1,2,3,4,5 ...- Weapon change
R - Reload
Esc - Exit the menu
LMB - Shoot
RMB - Aim

System:

ОС: Windows 7 +
CPU: 2 GHz
RAM: 512 мmb
VRAM: 256 mb
HDD: 719 mb
